name: MagiTech City Blitz
description:
WARNING: INCOMING S.I.G.I.L. BLITZ

It's time to get out into the city and find those S.I.G.I.L. Stones! Why you ask? They're only the most massive source of magical power in the world! If you get your hands on even just one, the whole city changes to match you! Imagine what would happen if you managed to get them all?

Race off on your own to find them all before the blitz ends, but beware the mystical creatures that will try to get in your way! Or, if you choose, invite some friends along as friends or foes!

MagiTech City Blitz is a racing/platforming/scavenger-hunt type game enjoyable for all ages and skill levels. Just follow the simple install instructions below and get blitzing!

MagiTech City Blitz brought to you by TeamTacoCat

Producer/Sound Designer – Hannah Pogue

Lead Programmer – Brian Walsh

Lead Artist – Paul Salas

Artists – Melissa Almirall and Tiffany Brodie

Level Designer – Kayla Garand

Programmer – Chris Oxley
